title: About Chordra
text: Chordra helps you practice chords more effectively through randomized progressions and a built-in metronome. Customize your practice, focus on chords you struggle with, and level up your playing.

features.title: 🎯 Weak chords
features.description: Select and practice specific chords that challenge you

features.title: 🔀 Random chords
features.description: Get new and challenging sequences every time

features.title: 🎵 Metronome
features.description: Keep perfect time while practicing with a built-in metronome

features.title: ⚙️ Settings
features.description: Adjust BPM, beat count, and chord display to your preference
